name: Lone Survivor (itch) (ArchJay)
description:
An infection has broken out across the world , you need to survive until a helicopter comes to take you to safety. Those infected become ravaging monsters and those immune wish to collect the antidote for their own profit. 

As the military drop supplies of antidote , be the first to grab it and avoid the infected! You will not be alone in trying to grab the antidote first! You could grab the antidote for others in need , but you will leave that for the real heroes! 

This was my first time i have developed a game for a Game Jam. Only had 2 days instead of 3 due to other commitments. This was Made for Mini Jam 129: Poison with the limitation of ' You are not the Hero'. Gave my self the challenge of creating 99% of the assets to try and improve my overall skills. Font is the only asset provided externally. 

WASD - Top Down Movement - Tank Controls

Thanks to Fontier's Fatality FPS Gaming Font Asset.
